msg_fld_ev_spray_02:
The repellent’s effect wore off! Would you like to
use another one?
msg_fld_ev_boxfull_01:
Your Pokémon Boxes are full! Better to try
again later.
msg_fld_ev_peoneymemo_01:
You jotted down the current status on
[VAR ITEM2(0001)].
msg_fld_gym_retire_01:
You’re in the middle of the Glaseado Gym’s
Snow Slope Run! Do you want to continue?
msg_fld_gym_retire_02:
You’re in the middle of Glaseado Mountain’s
Snow Slope Run! Do you want to continue?
msg_fld_field_ridepoke_01:
You’ll have no Pokémon left to battle with if you
do that!
msg_fld_field_ridepoke_02:
You’ll have no Pokémon left to battle with if you
do that! Better to find another path.
msg_fld_field_warppanel_01: Where would you like to go?
msg_fld_field_magicaltrade_01:
You have a Surprise Trade waiting to be
completed! Please connect to the internet.
msg_fld_field_cliff_return:
Would you like to go back to where you were
before you fell?
msg_fld_atlantis_back:
You hurried back to the others so you wouldn’t
get separated!
